faqs.question: I want to switch back to default ROM!
Can I use AOSP 5.0 as subROM?
faqs.answer: Yes, but only ROMs without the new blockimage flashing method (like frapeti's CM12 ROM).

faqs.question: Can I flash ROMs to external storage?
faqs.answer: Yes, you can, but it's untested. My SD Card (64GB SDXC Class 10) wasn't fast enough!

faqs.question: Can I flash ROMs with Aroma installer as subROM?
faqs.answer: No, sorry. Aroma installer is not supported! However you can still flash it as default ROM.
